name: LifeStraw Personal Filter
description: Compact personal water filter that removes 99.9999% of waterborne bacteria and parasites. Filters up to 1,000 gallons.

name: Nalgene Wide-Mouth 32oz
description: Durable BPA-free water bottle with measurement markings. Withstands temperatures from -40°F to 212°F.

name: Aquatabs Purification Tablets
description: 50-pack of water purification tablets. Each tablet treats 1 liter of water in 30 minutes.

name: Ferro Rod Fire Starter
description: 6-inch ferrocerium rod with striker. Produces 5,500°F sparks, works in any weather. Lasts 12,000+ strikes.

name: UCO Stormproof Matches
description: 25 windproof and waterproof matches that burn for 15 seconds each. Includes strikers and carrying case.

name: Bic Mini Lighter 3-Pack
description: Three reliable mini lighters. Each provides approximately 1,500 lights. Classic, proven fire source.

name: Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Tarp
description: Ultra-lightweight 10x10ft silnylon tarp with 8 tie-out points. Packs down to the size of a soda can.

name: SOL Emergency Bivvy
description: Reflective emergency sleeping bag that retains 90% of body heat. Tear-resistant and reusable.

name: Paracord 550 - 100ft
description: Military-grade 550 paracord with 7 inner strands. 550 lb tensile strength. Essential for shelter building.

name: Mountain House Beef Stroganoff
description: Freeze-dried meal serving 2. Just add boiling water. 30-year shelf life. 520 calories per serving.

name: Clif Bar Variety 12-Pack
description: 12 energy bars with 250 calories each. Provides sustained energy from organic oats and plant protein.

name: Stanley Adventure Cook Set
description: Stainless steel pot with lid, two cups, and vented lid. Nests for compact storage. Campfire safe.

name: Adventure Medical Ultralight Kit
description: Comprehensive first aid kit for 1-2 people on trips up to 4 days. Includes wound care, medications, and instructions.

name: CAT Tourniquet Gen 7
description: Combat Application Tourniquet used by US military. Self-applicable in emergencies. Can be applied in seconds.

name: QuikClot Gauze 3x4ft
description: Hemostatic gauze that stops severe bleeding 5x faster than regular gauze. Z-folded for rapid deployment.

name: Leatherman Signal Multi-Tool
description: 19 tools including knife, saw, ferro rod, and whistle. Built for outdoor adventurers. 25-year warranty.

name: Silky Gomboy 210mm Saw
description: Folding hand saw with curved blade for fast cutting. Cuts on pull stroke. Locks open and closed.

name: Petzl Actik Core Headlamp
description: 450-lumen rechargeable headlamp with red light mode. USB charging, 130-hour runtime on low. IPX4 rated.

name: Suunto MC-2 Compass
description: Professional-grade mirror sighting compass with clinometer. Adjustable declination. Luminous bezel.

name: Fox 40 Classic Whistle
description: Pealess whistle audible up to 1 mile. 115 decibels. Works when wet. International distress signal tool.
